name: Web Template
SELECT sensors
UPDATE sensors
query:
UPDATE sensors SET sensor_type = '{{{msg.payload.sensor_type}}}',
                    location =  '{{{msg.payload.location}}}',
                    user_id =  '{{{msg.payload.user_id}}}' 
            WHERE id = {{{msg.payload.id}}};

name: INSERT sensors
query: INSERT INTO sensors (sensor_type, location, user_id) VALUES ('{{{msg.payload.sensor_type}}}','{{{msg.payload.location}}}', {{{msg.payload.user_id}}});

name: DELETE sensors
query: DELETE FROM sensors WHERE id = {{{msg.payload.id}}};

name: showSaved
SELECT MAX sensors
query:
SELECT sensors.*, users.username
FROM sensors
JOIN users ON sensors.user_id = users.id
WHERE sensors.id = (SELECT MAX(id) FROM sensors);

name: SELECT users
query: SELECT * FROM users;

name: Web Template
SELECT users
query: SELECT * FROM users;

name: UPDATE users
INSERT users
query: INSERT INTO users (email, password) VALUES ('{{{msg.payload.email}}}',encriptar_constrasena('{{{msg.payload.password}}}'));

name: DELETE users
query: DELETE FROM users WHERE id = {{{msg.payload.id}}};
